[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1488196216918{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;background-image: url(https://biryaniustad.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/aboutus-home-section1-background.jpg?id=6391) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1488193440767{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1488196226729{margin-top: 150px !important;margin-bottom: 150px !important;}”][vc_column_inner][vc_custom_heading text=”About Us” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:70px|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff|line_height:68px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1489407128422{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1487231873874{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;background-image: url(http://goresto.modeltheme.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/pasta-home-section1-background.jpg?id=5903) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1487077101223{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1487160255027{margin-top: 150px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_inner][vc_custom_heading text=”BIRYANI USTAD” font_container=”tag:h1|text_align:left|color:%23252525″ use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1726592439766{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1726592709339{margin-top: 62px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]At Biryani Ustad, we elevate biryani to a fine art, blending tradition and taste in every aromatic plate. With recipes passed down through generations and perfected over time, our biryanis are crafted using only the freshest ingredients and authentic spices. Whether you’re craving the timeless Hyderabadi Biryani, a royal Mughlai Biryani, or a flavorful Vegetarian Biryani, we promise a culinary experience like no other.

Our Signature Biryani

Every dish at Biryani Ustad is an ode to the rich history of biryani. Our range includes succulent chicken, mutton, seafood, and vegetarian options, each prepared with fragrant basmati rice, slow-cooked meats, and a medley of spices that create an irresistible symphony of flavors.

Why Dine at Biryani Ustad?

  • Authenticity: We use traditional cooking methods and time-honored recipes to bring the true essence of biryani to your plate.
  • Master Chefs: Our expert chefs are the true Ustads (masters) in biryani-making, ensuring each dish is a masterpiece.
  • Cozy Ambiance: Dine in a setting that offers comfort with a touch of cultural flair, perfect for family gatherings or intimate meals.
  • Quick Delivery: Enjoy the taste of Biryani Ustad at home with our fast and reliable delivery service.

Our Menu

  • Hyderabadi Chicken Biryani: Tender chicken slow-cooked in layers of spiced basmati rice.
  • Mutton Biryani: Juicy mutton blended with aromatic herbs and spices, creating a rich and flavorful dish.
  • Seafood Biryani: A delicious mix of prawns and fish, infused with spices and cooked to perfection.
  • Vegetarian Biryani: A feast for the veggie lovers, packed with farm-fresh vegetables and flavorful rice.
  • Ustad’s Special Platters: Ideal for sharing or enjoying on your own, these platters are curated to showcase the best of our menu.

Catering & Events

Make your next event unforgettable with Biryani Ustad’s catering services. Whether it’s a wedding, birthday party, or corporate event, our team ensures that every guest is treated to a feast of mouthwatering biryani and more.

Visit Us

Join us at Biryani Ustad and indulge in the finest biryanis in town. Whether dining in or ordering out, we guarantee an unparalleled biryani experience.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1487231873874{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;background-image: url(http://goresto.modeltheme.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/pasta-home-section1-background.jpg?id=5903) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1487077101223{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1488194705147{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;background-image: url(https://biryaniustad.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/aboutus-home-section3-background.jpg?id=6399) !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1487155655013{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1488195388801{margin-top: 80px !important;margin-bottom: 80px !important;}” el_class=”white_skill_counter”][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]
